notes.personal_notes: The total number of assists during a season, except GW0 where previous season is listed
notes.official_explanation: Total goal assists – awarded to the player from the goalscoring team who makes the final pass before a goal is scored, including own goals.

notes.personal_notes: Given based on 'bsp' score given in each match
notes.official_explanation: The three best performing players in each match according to the BPS will receive additional bonus points - 3 points will be awarded to the highest scoring player, 2 to the second best and 1 to the third.

notes.personal_notes: The score/rating/rank awarded total in a season, based on score from each gw
notes.official_explanation: The Bonus Points System (BPS) uses a range of stats to create a BPS score for each player. The three best performing players in each match will be awarded bonus points.

chance_of_playing_next_round.description: The chance of a player playing next round

notes.personal_notes: Seems to be not to be filled (NaN) if player have no history of not being able to play

chance_of_playing_this_round.description: The chance in range 0.0 - 100.00 of a player playing this round

notes.personal_notes: Seems to be not to be filled (NaN) if player have no history of not being able to play.

clean_sheets.description: The total number of clean sheets

notes.personal_notes: How many clean sheets recorded in the course of season
notes.official_explanation: Total clean sheets – awarded to players who do not concede a goal and have played at least 60 minutes.

notes.personal_notes: Most probably the player idenfication number

feature_engineering.feature_notes: Keeping unquie identifier to join predictions

notes.personal_notes: Should apply to mainly corners - how found is unknown, perhaps number of corners taken during season
notes.official_explanation: This table displays a list of expected set-piece takers for each Premier League side. They are based on a mix of information gathered fom last season’s matches, the Opta statistics, pre-season friendlies and also the players role at previous clubs and predicted role at new sides. The list will be updated constantly as new information becomes available on assigned set-pieces takers. It will also be refreshed throughout the season as roles chop and change.

cost_change_event.description: Total positive price change during current gameweek

notes.personal_notes: Represent the positive change in price during current event. Positive value for cost rise, and negative value when cost falls.
notes.official_explanation: How much a player’s price has increased this Gameweek.

cost_change_event_fall.description: Total negative price change during current gameweek

notes.personal_notes: Represent the negative change in price during current event. Positive value for cost fall, and negative value when price rises.
notes.official_explanation: How much a player’s price has fallen this Gameweek.

cost_change_start.description: Total positive price change during current season

notes.personal_notes: Represent the positive change in price during current season. Positive value for cost rise, and negative value when cost falls.
notes.official_explanation: How much a player’s price has increased since the start of the season.

cost_change_start_fall.description: Total negative price change during current season

notes.personal_notes: Represent the negative change in price during current season. Positive value for cost falls, and negative value when cost rises.

Creativity assesses player performance in terms of producing goalscoring opportunities for others. It can be used as a guide to identify the players most likely to supply assists. While this analyses frequency of passing and crossing, it also considers pitch location and quality of the final ball.
notes.official_explanation: Creativity assesses player performance in terms of producing goalscoring opportunities for other players. Part of the ICT index.

creativity_rank.description: The current creativity ranking for the player

notes.personal_notes: Rank based on creativity score for all players in FPL season.

creativity_rank_type.description: Rank based on creativity score for all players in same posiition in FPL season.

notes.personal_notes: Other score than creativity_rank, after invesitgating it seems it is the rank for the player position

direct_freekicks_order.description: Rank of the direct freekick takers

notes.personal_notes: How rank is calculated is unknown, perhaps number of corners taken during season
notes.official_explanation: This table displays a list of expected set-piece takers for each Premier League side. They are based on a mix of information gathered fom last season’s matches, the Opta statistics, pre-season friendlies and also the players role at previous clubs and predicted role at new sides. The list will be updated constantly as new information becomes available on assigned set-pieces takers. It will also be refreshed throughout the season as roles chop and change.
The number of times a player has been selected in a Gameweek Dream Team. Players with the most points in a Gameweek in a valid formation earn a place in the Dream Team.

notes.personal_notes: Could be combined with element types object to get player position in text form
Expectance of playing next round. Needs further investigation
Expectance of playing this round. Needs further investigation
Needs to address what gw to link to.
notes.official_explanation: Total points earned in the latest Gameweek.
Form is a player’s average score per match, calculated from all matches played by his club in the last 30 days.

goals_conceded.description: Total number of goals conceded while player is on pitch

notes.official_explanation: Total number of goals conceded by a team while the player has been on the pitch.

goals_scored.description: Total number of goals scored by player

notes.official_explanation: Statistical index developed specifically to assess a player as an FPL asset, combining Influence, Creativity and Threat scores.

ict_index_rank.description: The current ICT ranking for the player among all players

notes.personal_notes: Rank based on ICT score for all players in FPL season.

ict_index_rank_type.description: The current ICT ranking for the player among players in same position

notes.personal_notes: Other score than ict_index_rank, after invesitgating it seems it is the rank for the player position

in_dreamteam.description: Flag to identify if player is in the current gw dreamteam

notes.personal_notes: Based on points ranking for position
Seems to be the total accumulated influence gathered throughout the season.
notes.official_explanation: Influence evaluates a player’s impact on a match, taking into account actions that could directly or indirectly affect the match outcome. Part of the ICT index.

influence_rank.description: The current influence ranking for the player among all players

notes.personal_notes: Rank based on influence score for all players in FPL season.

influence_rank_type.description: The current influence ranking for the player among players in same position

notes.personal_notes: Rank based on influence score for all players in same position.

minutes.description: Total amount of minutes played current season

news_added.description: Timestamp of when news is added

notes.official_explanation: Current buying price in the transfer market.

own_goals.description: Total number of own goals scored by player

penalties_missed.description: Total number of penalties missed by player

notes.official_explanation: Awarded to a player who takes a penalty but does not score from the penalty spot.

This table displays a list of expected set-piece takers for each Premier League side. They are based on a mix of information gathered fom last season’s matches, the Opta statistics, pre-season friendlies and also the players role at previous clubs and predicted role at new sides. The list will be updated constantly as new information becomes available on assigned set-pieces takers. It will also be refreshed throughout the season as roles chop and change.
Awarded to a goalkeeper who touches the ball when saving a penalty.

points_per_game.description: Average points per game played by player

notes.personal_notes: Must be investigated if it applies to all games where player is in match squad
notes.official_explanation: Player’s total points divided by player’s number of matches.

red_cards.description: Total number of red cards awarded to player

saves.description: Total number of saves made by player

notes.official_explanation: Total times a goalkeeper has saved a shot on goal.

selected_by_percent.description: Current selection percentage of the player

notes.official_explanation: The percentage of overall Fantasy managers who currently own the player.

notes.personal_notes: Not understood - only False entries in dataset as per 2020-09-16
Dead variable - seems all are set to None
Seems to indicate the availability of player. Contains 'a' (available), 'i' (injured), 'd' (?), 'n' (loaned out), 'u' (unregistered), 's' (suspended)'
Difference between team and team_code not understood. Probably a more permanent team id and independent of season

notes.official_explanation: Threat gauges players who are most likely to score goals. Part of the ICT index.

threat_rank.description: The current threat ranking for the player

notes.personal_notes: Rank based on threat score for all players in FPL season.

threat_rank_type.description: The current threat ranking for the player among players in same position

notes.personal_notes: Rank based on threat score for all players i same position for FPL season.

total_points.description: Total number of points earned by player

notes.personal_notes: Total number of points accumulated through a season for a player
Seems to be the total number of transfers in, made in course of season

transfers_in_event.description: Total amount of transfer made in during this event.

notes.personal_notes: Seems to be the total number of transfers in during an event. Resets when new event starts.
notes.official_explanation: Total number of times a player has been transferred in to a team this Gameweek.

notes.personal_notes: Seems to be the total number of transfers out, made in course of season
notes.official_explanation: Total number of times a player has been transferred out of a team this season.

transfers_out_event.description: Total amount of transfer made out during this event.

notes.personal_notes: Seems to be the total number of transfers in during an event. Resets when new event starts.
notes.official_explanation: Total number of times a player has been transferred out of a team this Gameweek.
Player’s form divided by player’s value.
Player’s total points divided by player’s value.
